sentences.english: "Painted Skin" is adapted from the ancient novel "Liaozhai Zhiyi", or "Strange Stories from a Chinese Studio", written by Pu Songling in the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《画皮》取材于清代蒲松龄的古代小说《聊斋志异》。

sentences.english: Strange Tales from a Lonely Studio by Pu Songling is a very popular collection of stories published in the early Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 清初的《聊斋志异》是一部广受欢迎的小说集。

sentences.english: This is a story from the book Strange Tales from Make-Do Studio.
The second chapter studies the transformation from the text to image of Strange Tales of a Lonely Studio.
sentences.chinese: 第二章重点研究《聊斋志异》从文字到影象的转换。

sentences.english: The third part is liaozhaizhiyi Stories in the "Villain" image of the functional analysis.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分是《聊斋志异》中“小人”形象的功能分析。

sentences.english: "Liao zhai zhi yi" in the Jiang princess ", is the concentrated outbreaks of example.
sentences.chinese: 《聊斋志异》中的《绛妃》，就是集中爆发的例证。
